overview.en: HurricaneSwap is the 1st cross-chain liquidity DEX based on Avalanche. With the innovative LP-Bridge mechanism (Roke Protocol), users can trade popular assets of other chains without leaving Avalanche. And taking the advantages of Avalanche, HurricaneSwap provides users with a high-performance, low slippage, low-cost and seamless cross-chain trading experience.
overview.zh: HurricaneSwap 是基于Avalanche开发的首个跨链协议。其原创的Roke协议创造了全新的跨链形式——“LP跨链”，即通过多链DEX流动性池进行资产凭证转换，从而使得Avalanche主链用户可以交易其他主链上的热门资产，在保证安全性的前提下，减少交易步骤，降低交易成本，提高交易效率
